013package org.apache.juneau.annotation;
014
015import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.*;
016import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArrayUtils.*;
018
019import java.lang.annotation.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
023
024/**
025 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link Swap @Swap} annotation.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
028 * </ul>
029 */
030public class SwapAnnotation {
031
032   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
033   // Static
034   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
035
036   /** Default value */
037   public static final Swap DEFAULT = create().build();
038
039   /**
040    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
041    *
042    * @return A new builder object.
043    */
044   public static Builder create() {
045      return new Builder();
046   }
047
048   /**
049    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
050    *
051    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
052    * @return A new builder object.
053    */
054   public static Builder create(Class<?>...on) {
055      return create().on(on);
056   }
057
058   /**
059    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
060    *
061    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
062    * @return A new builder object.
063    */
064   public static Builder create(String...on) {
065      return create().on(on);
066   }
067
068   /**
069    * Creates a copy of the specified annotation.
070    *
071    * @param a The annotation to copy.s
072    * @param r The var resolver for resolving any variables.
073    * @return A copy of the specified annotation.
074    */
075   public static Swap copy(Swap a, VarResolverSession r) {
076      return
077         create()
078         .impl(a.impl())
079         .mediaTypes(r.resolve(a.mediaTypes()))
080         .on(r.resolve(a.on()))
081         .onClass(a.onClass())
082         .template(r.resolve(a.template()))
083         .value(a.value())
084         .build();
085   }
086
087   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
088   // Builder
089   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
090
091   /**
092    * Builder class.
093    *
094    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
095    *    <li class='jm'>{@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder#annotations(Annotation...)}
096    * </ul>
097    */
098   public static class Builder extends TargetedAnnotationTMFBuilder<Builder> {
099
100      Class<?> impl=void.class, value=void.class;
101      String template="";
102      String[] mediaTypes={};
103
104      /**
105       * Constructor.
106       */
107      protected Builder() {
108         super(Swap.class);
109      }
110
111      /**
112       * Instantiates a new {@link Swap @Swap} object initialized with this builder.
113       *
114       * @return A new {@link Swap @Swap} object.
115       */
116      public Swap build() {
117         return new Impl(this);
118      }
119
120      /**
121       * Sets the {@link Swap#impl()} property on this annotation.
122       *
123       * @param value The new value for this property.
124       * @return This object.
125       */
126      public Builder impl(Class<?> value) {
127         this.impl = value;
128         return this;
129      }
130
131      /**
132       * Sets the {@link Swap#mediaTypes()} property on this annotation.
133       *
134       * @param value The new value for this property.
135       * @return This object.
136       */
137      public Builder mediaTypes(String...value) {
138         this.mediaTypes = value;
139         return this;
140      }
141
142      /**
143       * Sets the {@link Swap#template()} property on this annotation.
144       *
145       * @param value The new value for this property.
146       * @return This object.
147       */
148      public Builder template(String value) {
149         this.template = value;
150         return this;
151      }
152
153      /**
154       * Sets the {@link Swap#value()} property on this annotation.
155       *
156       * @param value The new value for this property.
157       * @return This object.
158       */
159      public Builder value(Class<?> value) {
160         this.value = value;
161         return this;
162      }
163
164      // <FluentSetters>
165
166
167      // </FluentSetters>
168   }
169
170   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
171   // Implementation
172   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
173
174   private static class Impl extends TargetedAnnotationTImpl implements Swap {
175
176      private final Class<?> impl, value;
177      private final String template;
178      private final String[] mediaTypes;
179
180      Impl(Builder b) {
181         super(b);
182         this.impl = b.impl;
183         this.mediaTypes = copyOf(b.mediaTypes);
184         this.template = b.template;
185         this.value = b.value;
186         postConstruct();
187      }
188
189      @Override /* Swap */
190      public Class<?> impl() {
191         return impl;
192      }
193
194      @Override /* Swap */
195      public String[] mediaTypes() {
196         return mediaTypes;
197      }
198
199      @Override /* Swap */
200      public String template() {
201         return template;
202      }
203
204      @Override /* Swap */
205      public Class<?> value() {
206         return value;
207      }
208   }
209
210   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
211   // Appliers
212   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
213
214   /**
215    * Applies targeted {@link Swap} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder}.
216    */
217   public static class Applier extends AnnotationApplier<Swap,BeanContext.Builder> {
218
219      /**
220       * Constructor.
221       *
222       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
223       */
224      public Applier(VarResolverSession vr) {
225         super(Swap.class, BeanContext.Builder.class, vr);
226      }
227
228      @Override
229      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<Swap> ai, BeanContext.Builder b) {
230         Swap a = ai.inner();
231         if (isEmptyArray(a.on(), a.onClass()))
232            return;
233         b.annotations(copy(a, vr()));
234      }
235   }
236
237   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
238   // Other
239   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
240
241   /**
242    * A collection of {@link Swap @Swap annotations}.
243    */
244   @Documented
245   @Target({METHOD,TYPE})
246   @Retention(RUNTIME)
247   @Inherited
248   public static @interface Array {
249
250      /**
251       * The child annotations.
252       *
253       * @return The annotation value.
254       */
255      Swap[] value();
256   }
257}
